name: Molnar
description: Recreation of one of Vera Moln√°rs artworks. The code was inspired by Garrits molnar.js but modified. The main idea was to make it pop with some motion and color. By playing around with the code I managed to randomize the color of each stroke and make the artwork flicker.

name: Name of your experiment
description: Explains the what and the why. What is the main idea? What is the purpose? Describes the coding process and implementation choices and gives a high level system overview.
